akas: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (original title)
Bakugan Savascilari: Gandelyali Istilacilar Turkey (Turkish title)
Bakugan: Mechtanium Surge USA (fourth season title)
akas from release info: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (original title)
Bakugan Savascilari: Gandelyali Istilacilar Turkey (Turkish title)
Bakugan: Mechtanium Surge USA (fourth season title)

1.title: Interspace Showdown

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

1.plot: The Brawlers have returned to Earth and are back battling inside the expanded and awesome Bakugan Interspace. With an influx of new participants there is no shortage of battlers vying for Dan's number one ranking, which finds him being challenged at every turn. Adding to our hero's woes is the evil masked man who haunts his dreams each night, demanding that he "surrender his power". As Dan prepares to fight his latest challenger, he struggles with visions of his demonic tormentor, unaware that they are linked to the incredible display of power that Drago is about to ...

2.title: Mechtogan Mayhem

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

2.plot: Dan and Drago begin a rigorous training regimen as they attempt to get Drago's newly inherited powers under control. During one of the rounds Drago is hit by another mysterious vision and the energy begins to seep from his body. Soon it forms a new, giant Bakugan, which identifies itself as Zenthon Mechtogan. Almost as quickly as it appears, the new creation vanishes, teleporting itself inside Bakugan Interspace where it proceeds to wreak havoc.

3.title: Disconnect

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

3.plot: Dan and Drago continue to be evasive with their teammates as they try and figure out the link between Code Eve's powers and the birth of the Mechtogan, Zenthon. Meanwhile, their popularity in Bakugan Interspace begins to wane as the fans turn their support to Anubias and Sellon. When the pair is challenged to a battle by Anubias, they accept and quickly find themselves struggling to control Drago's new powers. As the energy threatens to erupt once more, Dan faces the reality, that losing may be the only safe way out.

4.title: Fall from Grace

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

4.plot: Marucho and Shun discover that Dan and Drago have been practicing in secret, which leads to the revelation that Zenthon was born of Drago's new powers. Before they can confront Dan further, he's challenged to a battle by Sellon. Concerned that Drago may lose control and Zenthon will reappear, Shun talks Dan into a tag team match. Unfortunately, it soon becomes clear, that an extra team member may not be enough to keep Drago's mighty powers in check.

5.title: Tri-Twister Take Down

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

5.plot: A pair of lowly battlers named Dion and Lucas are gifted a trio of mysterious Bakugan that, unbeknownst to them, have come from the evil Mag Mel. Now under the influence of his dark powers, they storm Bakugan Interspace!

6.title: Agony of Defeat

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

6.plot: After his latest victory over Sellon, Anubias is slated to face Dan for the title of Bakugan Interspace Champion. Still concerned with Drago's lack of control over his powers Shun and Marucho try and talk Dan out of battling but he refuses. As the match gets underway, both Dan and Drago suffer from hallucinations in which they believe they are actually fighting Mag Mel and Razenoid. This causes Drago to summon every ounce of his power, which immediately puts everyone in proximity in peril. As things star to get crazy, Shun tries desperately to snap his teammates out ...

7.title: BakuNano

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

7.plot:

10.title: A Royale Pain

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

10.plot: With Dan gone, Shun assumes leadership of the Battle Brawlers. When Shun joins a Battle Royale in an attempt to control the chaos, he is rescued by two mysterious battlers!

11.title: Episode #2.11

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

11.plot: Marucho works out a plan with his father to exit Bakugan Interspace before the deletion program destroys it for good. But will they make it out on time when a giant swarm of Choas Bakugan attack?

12.title: Mind Search

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

12.plot: Dan and Drago try to solve the identity of the mysterious masked entity haunting their dark visions. Meanwhile, Marucho teaches Paige and Rafe a lesson about strategy.

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Triple Threat

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

14.plot: In a fierce battle against Sellon on Neathia; Dan and Drago summon Mechtogan Zenthon for help. But they get more than they bargained for when a Mechtogan Titan appears!

15.title: Interspace Under Siege

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

15.plot: Dan and Drago return from New Vestroia to help the Battle Brawlers defend Interspace from the rampaging Caos Bakugan. A familiar face from the past shows up just in time to lend a much-needed hand.

16.title: A Hero Returns

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

16.plot: Under Marucho's leadership the Brawlers attempt to delete the Chaos Bakugan from Interspace. Dan and Drago make an appearance with Zenthon but are unable to control the Mechtogan.

17.title: Gundalia Under Fire

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

17.plot: The Battle Brawlers race to the aid of their old friends Ren, Fabia and Nurzak on Gundalia. With the Chaos Bakugan destroying Gundalia there is precious time to loose! Dan's link with Mag Mel puts the Brawlers in jeopardy.

18.title: Battle Lines

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

18.plot: Dan and Drago strike out on their own to confront Mag Mel. Shun gives chase and tries to stop him. The two teammates clash, but are interrupted by Anubias and Sellon. Dan and Shun must come together if there is a chance of defeating the real enemy!

19.title: Unlocking the Gate

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

19.plot: Dan and Drago are face to face with Mag Mel and Razenoid and the two sides square off in a fierce battle. Drago has a close encounter with Razenoid that may irrevocably tip the scales in favour of evil and threaten the very existence of every living Bakugan.

20.title: True Colours

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

20.plot: The Brawlers race back to Earth and discover the Chaos Bakugan are destroying Bakugan Interspace. Anubias and Sellon reveal they are working with Mag Mel. The Brawlers are trapped in interspace and must find a way to escape!

21.title: Dangerous Beauty

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

21.plot: A wave of Chaos Bakugan causes the Bawlers to split up to fend off the attack. Mid-battle Dan is summoned by Sellon who lures him with information about the link he shares with Mag Mel. The other Brawlers urge him not to go, but Dan needs to know the truth.

22.title: Unfinished Business

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

22.plot: Dan receives what appears to be a distress call from Noah. Anubias announces that he is holding Noah hostage, and demands that Dan come and battle him. Dan accepts the challenge and a fierce battle ensues; playing directly into Mag Mel's clutches!

23.title: Behind The Mask

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

23.plot: Dan attempts to link with Mag Mel again, but on a deeper level. One that will allow him to destroy his enemy once and for all; however, it's up to the rest of the Brawlers to keep the invading swarm of Chaos Bakugan at bay, long enough for him to succeed.

24.title: Interspace Armageddon

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

24.plot: Marucho reveals his plan to completely delete Bakugan Interspace while his father and Kato work on an escape plan. The Brawlers round up the remaining battlers in Interspace and prepare to leave Interspace when a hoard of Chaos Bakugan suddenly appear. The Brawlers remain behind as the others escape when a mysterious Mechtogan appears and takes out the Chaos Bakugan. Spectra and Helios arrive and give time for everyone else to escape, but are caught in the deletion process! When they arrive back on Earth, they discover a mysterious dark moon in the sky. On the other ...

25.title: Dark Rise

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

25.plot:

26.title: The Final Takedown

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

26.plot: The final battle continues with Dan and Mag Mel, while the others are fighting the remaining Bakugan, Mechtogan, and Mechtogan Titans on Earth. Razenoid and Drago continue to fight and Drago is about to get hit, but Zenthon and Zenthon Titan come to protect Dan and Drago. Mag Mel and Razenoid then summon Dreadeon and Razen Titan (called Dreadeon Titan) and they continue to fight. Dan and Drago tell them that they should only be fighting them not the innocent but Mag Mel responds as it is an act of revenge and he doesn't care about nobility. On Earth, the drilling has ...

27.title: Evil Arrival

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

27.plot: After Mag Mel's defeat at the hands of the Brawlers, peace reigns once again in the universe. All of the Bakugan have left New Vestroia and are living on Earth amongst the humans; but things quickly change with the arrival of four evil Mechtogan. Having escaped from the Doom Dimension and lead by Coredegon, they want to exterminate every last living Bakugan in order to bring about an era where Mechtogan rule. Of course, the Brawlers have something to say about this and immediately put up a fight, but this time they may be outnumbered and out powered. Luckily Dan and ...

28.title: Wiseman Cometh

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

28.plot: Peace appears to have returned to Bakugan City after the Brawlers made short work of the invading Mechtogan; however it doesn't last long. A new foe by the name of Wiseman appears and starts wreaking havoc with his crew of Nonet Bakugan (evil Bakugans he has freed from the Doom Dimension). It seems that Wiseman is vehemently opposed to humans and Bakugan living together in harmony, so it's up to the Brawlers to rid their home of this new enemy threat. As the battle ensues, Reptak notices something very curious...Wiseman's battle style is remarkably similar to that of ...

29.title: Mysterious Bond

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

29.plot: Fearful of another attack by Wiseman and his Mechtogans, the Brawlers ask Reptak to join Dan and Drago as their additional partner Bakugan. The offer upsets Reptak who feels that by accepting he will be turning his back on his true partner Gunz (who is still M.I.A.). In an attempt to calm him down, Dan and Drago agree to help Reptak search for his missing friend. Soon they find themselves ambushed by Wiseman and a ferocious battle ensues. Reptak finally admits to his teammates that he suspects Wiseman and Gunz are one and the same, as they continue to get pummeled by ...

30.title: The Prodigal Bakugan

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

30.plot: Jaakor is visited by his two former students: Skytruss and Orbeum. It seems that many of the Bakugan are fearful of Wiseman and wish to return to the safety of New Vestroia. Skytruss and Orbeum have come to plead with Jaakor to return to New Vestroia with them, as they will need the protection of a Bakugan as mighty as him against any potential threat should Wiseman choose to follow them. Torn between his loyalty to Shun and his Bakugan brothers, Jaakor is faced with an impossible choice; but it's a decision he'll have to make quickly...because Wiseman has arrived ...

31.title: Episode #2.31

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

31.plot:

32.title: Enemy Allies

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

32.plot: Wiseman returns to challenge the Dan and the gang. Mira develops new battle suits for the Brawler's bakugan but passes out due to exhaustion right when she's about to show them to use the suits. Wiseman's forces soon overpower the Brawler's forces and they can't access the new battle suits since Mira is in the hospital. Luckily a surprise blast from the past shows up to help save the day.

33.title: Battle for Bakugan Land

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

33.plot: Julie and the Brawlers go to Bakugan Land, an amusment park that celebrates the friendship between humans and Bakugans. They're having a great time until Wiseman shows up to spoil their day. Julie tries to get to the bottom of what Wiseman's true motive is but he proves to be as elusive as ever. Bakugan Land becomes the staging ground for another epic battle between the Brawlers and Wiseman.

34.title: Gunz Blazing

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

34.plot: The Brawlers had all just given up hope of ever seeing Gunz again when suddenly he reappeared. Unfortunately he had no memory of what had happened to him during his disappearance. It wasn't long before things got crazy again with Wiseman and his Mechtogan showing up. The timing was so strange the Brawlers were starting to wonder if Reptak was right...was Wiseman really Gunz in disguise? One thing's for sure, the battle you're going to see is gonna totally blow your mind!

35.title: Episode #2.35

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

35.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

36.title: Countdown to Doomsday

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

36.plot: The Brawlers go on the hunt for Wiseman's hideout in an effort to trap him there. But Wiseman brings out the powerful Mechtogan Mechtavius Destroyer in a vicious battle against Dragonoid Destroyer.

37.title: The Eve of Extermination

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

37.plot: With the clock counting down to Mechtavius Destroyer's dreaded return, the Brawlers find themselves missing a crucial member. Dragonoid Destroyer is still recuperating after the last battle and without a Mechtogan by their side, any chance of victory over Wiseman and his evil horde seems hopeless. Faced with no alternative, the Brawlers charge head on into battle and discover that even though Dragonoid Destroyer is sitting this one out...he still may be the one to save the day.

38.title: Episode #2.38

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

38.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

39.title: Enemy Infiltration

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

39.plot: The Nonets begin to get curious about the true identity and motives of Wiseman. They find a hidden body that bears a striking resemblance to Wiseman and want answers. Meanwhile, Dan and the Brawlers try to take on the combined forces of the Nonets and struggle to overcome their might.

40.title: Gunz Lives!

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

40.plot: Gunz wakes up in his own worst nightmare and realizes that the evil ringleader Wiseman looks just like him! Can anyone help him remember what happened before Wiseman permanently steals his identity?

41.title: Evil Evolution

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

41.plot: The Brawlers learn the origin of Wiseman. In what seems like their darkest hour, Gunz appears at the worst time, taking on the mantle of Wiseman and leading the Nonets.

42.title: Evil vs. Evil

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

42.plot: The Brawlers are banished to the Doom Dimension, and the Nonets are being led by a new version of Wiseman, or maybe it's Gunz in disguise, no one really knows! The hardest part of the battle is going to be deciding who the Brawlers need to defeat first!

43.title: Doom Dimension Throwdown

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

43.plot: Still trapped in the Doom Dimension, the Brawlers find themselves face to face with Gunz and Betadron who are itching for a fight. Unable to negotiate a truce, the Brawlers decide to engage in battle, in hopes that a victory will allow them to return their focus to finding an escape route back to Earth. Meanwhile, in Bakugan City, Mechtavius Destroyer shows up and unleashes the first part of his master plan...Something so sinister and destructive it's beyond what anyone could have ever imagined.

44.title: Blast from the Past

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

44.plot: After attacking Bakugan City, Mechtavius Destroyer invades New Vestroia. The Bakugan put up a brave fight but are no match for his strength. In the Doom Dimension Professor Worton presents a plan to the Brawlers for their escape.

45.title: Episode #2.45

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

45.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

46.title: End of the Line

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

46.plot: In the final battle against Mechtavius Destroyer, Dragonoid Destroyer uses the energy from the powerful bond between humans and Bakugan to defeat him.

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

2.title: Revelation

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

2.plot: Dan continues to be haunted by the visions he saw while unconscious after an explosion during battle. Meanwhile Marucho notices that Ren is also behaving strangely. When he presses him on his odd behaviour, Ren reveals that he is in fact an alien from the planet Gundalia and that he has come to Earth to enlist the Brawlers' help. His home is under attack by the vicious Neathia tribe who area using their Bakugan as weapons of war.

3.title: The Visitor

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

3.plot: The other Brawlers get together with Ren, who reveals the identities of more of the Neathian sleeper agents. Meanwhile, a tardy Dan who has slept in, races to get to the meeting. On the way, he crosses paths with a mysterious girl named Fabia who literally sends him head over heels. The gang soon learns that Fabia is in fact a Neathian herself. Convinced she's there to draft the Brawlers into fighting for her side, Dan challenges her to a battle.

4.title: Brawler to Be

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

4.plot: Dan is in the midst of training Jake in the battle arena with hopes that he will soon be skilled enough to become a member of the Battle Brawlers. An urgent message comes through from Marucho stating that another Neathian sleeper agent had been detected. The Brawlers race to the scene where the come face to face with the culprit: Mason Brown. Jake convinces Dan to let him battle Mason, but the Brawler in training's cockiness gets the best of him.

5.title: Confrontation

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

5.plot: With the Neathian moles making themselves known, they begin kidnapping brawlers from Bakugan Interspace. The puzzling part is that each brawler is eventually returned to BI. Meanwhile, Sid and Zenet find their recruiting hard when Marucho puts out an announcement to everyone not to battle Sid, Lena, Mason, Jesse and Zenet. In retaliation, Sid and Zenet challenge Dan and Ren to a battle. Ren is quickly taken out but Dan makes an easy comeback, eliminating both Zenet and Sid.

6.title: Exposed

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

6.plot: Marucho and Ren finish an expansion for a new arena within Bakugan Interspace. Dan and Jake are excited, but before they can give it a test run, another Neathian agent shows up, Jessie Glenn. Dan is ready to battle Jessie, however, Shun and Fabia appear from out of no where, telling Dan that Jessie is lying to him about being a Neathian and that Fabia is a true Neathian. Fabia challenges Jessie, only to be defeated. Shun reveals to everyone that Ren is really the enemy. Ren runs away, and so does Marucho after Shun's harsh words about Ren.

7.title: Truth

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Hostel Takeover

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Twin Attack

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

9.plot: Jake, using Coredem's body teleportation powers, manages to take Dan with him into Bakugan Interspace. They witness brainwashed kids luring more kids back to Gundalia. The same two brawlers who accused Dan of lying reappear, now brainwashed by Gundalia, and battle Dan and Jake.

10.title: Escape from Darkness

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

10.plot: With Ren and the Gundalians now in control of Bakugan Interspace, Marucho determines that the security system preventing the Brawlers from diving in is being run out of the secure "Baku-Room". He hatches a plan to infiltrate the stronghold so he can reboot the system and allow the Brawlers access once again. With the aid of Fabia and a digital Avatar of himself, he sets his plan in motion but it isn't long before trouble arrives.

11.title: The Secret Package

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

11.plot: When the invading Gundalians breakthrough the outer shield, Neathian Castle Guard Linus flees to Earth in search of Fabia. With him he is carrying "The Element" a mysterious and powerful item that the Gundalians need to get their hands on in order to rule the galaxy. Once he reaches Bakugan Interspace he meets up with Shun who has been busy trying to evacuate the kids trapped inside to safety.

12.title: The Element

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

12.plot: In an attempt to get Neo Zipzam back before the Gundalians realize he possesses the Element, the Brawlers infiltrate Bakugan Interspace and walk into the middle of a Gundalian power struggle. Angry at Ren's "teacher's pet" status, Sid has hijacked Neo, threatening to take credit for his capture with the Emperor. Now face to face with the Battle Brawlers, Sid challenges Dan to a battle but at the last minute pulls a switch and fights with Rubanoid rather than Neo.

13.title: Twin Evil

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

13.plot: Given a brief pardon by Barodius after his earlier failure, Ren hatches a plot with Zenet to regain possession of the Element. With deception as their key ingredient, Zenet disguises herself as Julie and attempts to trick Dan into handing over Drago (and the Element he contains within). The ruse almost works until the real Julie shows up and things quickly go from strange to insane.

14.title: The Sacred Orb

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

14.plot: The Brawlers arrive at Neathia and meet Fabia's sister Queen Serena. With her blessing, Fabia takes her new friends to see the Sacred Orb, a source of great power that is hidden deep inside a mountain. Before they can learn the Orb's true power, the Brawlers are summoned to the battlefront as the Gundalians break through the Neathian's second security shield. With Barodius leading the enemy charge, the Brawlers are under intense pressure to keep the Sacred Orb and its power from falling into the hands of evil.

15.title: Decoy Unit

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

15.plot: With only one remaining security shield protecting Neathia from the invading Gundalian forces, the Brawlers hatch a plan to reinstate a previously destroyed shield. Marucho, Jake and Elright head for the frontlines to battle the lead invaders, and provide a distraction. Meanwhile, Dan, Fabia and Shun travel through heavy jungle in search of the power source for the fallen shield so they can jump-start it. As Marucho and Jake get the Brawling action started, the question soon becomes: Can they keep the Gundalians occupied long enough for Dan and the others to find what...

16.title: The Secret Switch

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

16.plot: Dan, Fabia and Shun continue to make their way through the jungle to the shield generator building, when Stoica and Jesse suddenly ambush them. Shun quickly flees the scene leaving his friends to face the Gundalians. Strangely, it is Fabia who leads the Brawlers into battle with Dan sitting on the sidelines. As the brawling rages on Stoica grows increasingly suspicious of Dan's reluctance to fight and soon discovers that the Brawlers have once again fooled them with a clever deception.

17.title: Battle for the Second Shield

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

17.plot: Having made it to the Generator Building, Shun and Drago find themselves up against an army of Gundalian Guards, as they attempt to restart the Second Shield. To make matters worse, Lena and Kazarina show up out of nowhere and challenge them to a battle. Luckily Dan and Hawktor arrive to provide much needed back up. With the odds stacked against them, the Brawlers fight with everything they have in an attempt to reclaim the one thing that will force a Gundalian retreat.

18.title: Curtain Call

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

18.plot: With the Second Shield back up and running the Brawlers help the Neathians rebuild their strongholds. Frustrated that they are losing momentum, Jake strikes out on his own in search of more Gundalians to fight. Just as Fabia intercepts him, Ren and Jesse ambush them. The two sides soon square off, except this time Jesse has traded finesse for ferocity...as though this will be the last battle he will ever fight...

19.title: The Secret of the Orb

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Partners Til the End

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

20.plot: Fearing that her life may be at risk, Zenet morphs into a doppelganger of Ren in order to accompany Gill on a mission to destroy the Second Shield. Desperate to prove her worth to her Master, Zenet ultimately fails in battle but quickly rebounds by using her morphing abilities again. What she uncovers is so incredible it could secure her a place in the Twelve Orders...or make her a dangerous enemy of the state.

21.title: Divide and Conquer

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

21.plot: On the eve of the revolt against Barodius, Nurzak sends a message to the Brawlers asking to meet and discuss a peace treaty. When the Brawlers show up for the meeting Nurzak is nowhere to be found. Little do they know, that the Gundalian elder has been betrayed by his partner Kazarina, and now finds himself fighting for his life against the very Emperor he wanted to overthrow.

22.title: The Return of Koji

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Sid Returns

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

23.plot: As Ren prepares to launch an attack on the restored Second Shield, something strange is happening deep within the bowels of the Gundalian Palace. Sid, stirs from his medically induced slumber, and finds that he and his other "discarded" teammates are being kept in specimen jars. Quickly he breaks free and stows away on the troop ships destined for Neathia. With a new score to settle, Sid lays in wait, anxious for the right moment to make his surprise return.

24.title: Colossus Dharak

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

24.plot: Once Kazarina finally completes the upgrades on Exokor, the Twelve Orders descend on Neathia to take down the restored Second Shield. Dan makes another plea to Ren to switch sides but is interrupted by Barodius who launches an all out assault with Colossus Dharak! The Brawlers soon find themselves on the ropes and Barodius turns to Ren, demanding that he finish them off. Conflicted by his loyalties, Ren's response shocks everyone, including himself.

25.title: Dragonoid Colossus

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

25.plot: Ren's conflicting loyalties finally come to a head when he decides to turn his back on Barodius. Furious at the betrayal, the Emperor challenges him to a battle and immediately begins pummeling him. Frustrated by their losing efforts and the continuous berating by Barodius, Linehalt explodes, unleashing his long dormant Forbidden Power. As everyone struggles against the incredible destructive force, an even more impressive power shows its face with the appearance of Dragonoid Colossus...

26.title: Forgiveness

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

26.plot: When the Brawlers are transported back to the Royal Palace, Ren is nowhere to be found. They learn that the Third Shield has been outfitted with a Bio-Filter that prevents anyone with Gundalian DNA from passing through. When Dan asks Fabia to take the shield down and allow Ren to enter, she storms off in anger, revealing her deep-seated distrust of Ren. Serena reveals to the others that Fabia's fiance was a casualty in the war with Gundalia, which is why she cannot forgive anyone with Gundalian blood. Meanwhile, Fabia finds Ren and gives him one chance at redemption.....

27.title: Into the Storm

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

27.plot: When a geomagnetic storm sweeps across Neathia, knocking out the security system's radar, the Brawlers are forced to patrol the perimeter of the Third Shield to watch for Gundalian attack ships. While on their rounds, Dan and Jake find a child named Robin who says he is one of the kidnapped Earth kids and has escaped from his Gundalian captors. He asks for their help in going back to rescue the other kids he left behind.

34.title: Final Strike

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

34.plot: Ren and Fabia reunite with Shun and Marucho and regroup with Mason at Nurzak's secret lair. Meanwhile, Kazarina's experiments have succeeded and she is ready to splice Drago's DNA with Dharak's. This results in Dharak evolving into Phantom Dharak as well as his DNA no longer containing Gundalian DNA, allowing him to pass the third shield. In return, Barodius names Kazarina his second in command, demoting Gill in the process. Mason decides to go look for Nurzak, as there is a chance he survived while the others break into the castle to find Dan.

35.title: Dream Escape

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

35.plot: Just as Kazarina is about to finish Dan off, Jake breaks free of the hypnosis and stops her. Fabia arrives and holds off Lumagrowl while Jake and Coredem rescue Dan and Drago. During the battle, Kazarina and Lumagrowl reveal Aranaut's last time on Gundalia: when Jin was killed and he was captured. Aranaut reveals he knew the entire time and was only faking because Fabia had never mentioned Jin because she wanted to protect him.

40.title: Gundalian Showdown

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

40.plot: The brawlers must head back to Neathia to defend it from Dharak's attack but Kazarina, Stoica, Gill and Airzel are determined to keep them on Gundalia. The brawlers manage to fight them off and escape, but Fabia remains behind to fight Kazarina, as she has a vendetta against her for the death of her fiance, Jin. The brawlers quickly make their way back to Neathia, with the Gundalian forces close behind, as Elright and Linus who has Rubanoid as his partner attempt to fight back.

41.title: Broken Spell

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

41.plot: Just as the Brawlers return to Neathia, Fabia and Kazarina continue their battle. However, Lumagrowl begins disobeying Kazarina's orders and is determined to finish off Aranaut with or without her. Nurzak confronts Kazarina and tries to convince her that Barodius is just using her but she refuses to listen, claiming that Barodius will make her his queen. She flees from the battle and is confronted by Gill, who kills her, thus freeing Lena, Zenet and Jesse from her control.

42.title: Code Eve

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

42.plot: Nurzak, Mason and Fabia attempt to return to Neathia on Nurzak's ship but they are stopped by Gill, though they do manage to escape and arrive just in time to help the brawlers. Lena, Zenet and Jesse are surprised to see Nurzak and Mason alive, but are nonetheless happy. Gill arrives on the scene and tries to convince Barodius that Fabia killed Kazarina, however, Barodius knows it was Gill who killed her and shoots down his ship, along with Airzel who tried to save him.

43.title: Destiny Revealed

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

43.plot: Code Eve explains that in the beginning, Dragonoid and Dharaknoid had battled each other and the result split the universe in two (Dragonoid's half formed into Vestroia and Dharaknoid's half created Neathia and Gundalia) which is why she had brought them to a mid dimension to battle, so no innocents would come to harm. Drago struggles against Dharak, and is knocked out and reverts to a primal state, relying solely on instinct, but Dan manages to snap him out of it.

-1.title: Jake's Last Stand

episode of.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders (TV Series 2010–2012)

-1.plot: Disguised as a Gundalian Soldier, Marucho and Akwimos infiltrate a troop briefing and are surprised to discover that it's being lead by Jake. As his former teammates look on in shock, he proceeds to educate the Gundalian forces as to the secret battle strategies of the Brawlers. The lecture is interrupted by Kazarina, who alerts the troops to the invading forces from Neathia and scrambles them for a seek and destroy mission.

imdb.title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders
plot: Follows human battle brawlers who wield creatures called Bakugan in a parallel-dimension battle that shifts into our world.::Anonymous
